title: Can someone answer this?
body: So, i was playing a normal match and i was playing katarina. I end up going 30/4 which, in most cases, is pretty good. The thing i want answered is, why does viktor (on my team) get an S- when he went 5/9 and i got an A+ when i went 30/4, Riot answer this please ... or anyone.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/6WbpJ9nE-why?comment=0000

Pretty good discussion in the post there. Do forgive linking to another thread but I feel your question has been adequately answered over there :P

If you wanna know anything else feel free to ask.

Yeah thanks for that, I read the first comment talking about it, but this draven went 18/4 and got an A so does that mean that the reason that i got an A when i went 30/4 is because most people that play katarina get more kills than this?
And also, the Victor went 5/9 and got an A, so are you saying that most Victor's get this ( in the post you linked ).
Pretty much sums it up, but your score depends on more than just KDA. Things like CS, Dragon/Baron participation, wards and a whole bunch of other things go into it too.
